Robert Lucente wrote:

> "if it "cannot" change, then I guess the people involved don't think it very
> important to test it."
> 
> Thanks for the words. I hope you don't mind if I use almost the same exact
> words in some other similar situations.

I don't mind at all. It's a reminder that there is a trade-off. It's a 
shame that the community at large still undervalues the testing side of 
that trade-off. (Of course, that's just my opinion.)
